topics.body:
GUYS! I'M BACK!

It was the festive Raya season so I went to celebrate it at my grandma's place. We had another house next to hers so we could stay there instead. There were cookies, food, colourful lights, fireworks, miniature dynamites made for amusement, songs and a lot of other things. It was festive and tiring.

I played Sims 4 a lot.
